Attendance Tracking : App uses OpenCV to track student attendance via camera and displays it in the Android app. 

Notice Board : Teachers can post notices for students, ensuring important information is easily accessible. 

Study Notes Sharing : Teachers share study materials directly through the app for student access.

File Upload : Admins upload files like attendance records and notices for easy access.

Smart Class Project 
Welcome to the Smart Class Project!

1. Registration:
Create your account by entering your details in the registration form.
Provide your Roll No, Full Name, Email, Password, and Class.
Click "Register" to complete the process.
2. Login:
Use your registered email and password to log in.
Enter your credentials on the login screen.
Click "Login" to access your account.
3. Dashboard:
Upon login, you'll see the dashboard with options based on your role (Admin/Student).
Admins have additional features for user management and content upload.
4. Features:
Admins can manage users and upload content.
Students can view notices, study materials, and attendance records.
5. Logging Out:
To log out, go to settings or profile and select "Logout".
6. Need Help?
Contact support for assistance or check the FAQs for common questions.
